text: Nɨbi nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Tɨmud pɨl gɨl, Bɨawl takaw agup ak yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd ma nɨgɨnɨgun agɨl gos nɨŋɨd, ma yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb. Mel yɨbɨl. Binɨb bɨlel lum awl mɨdɨl takaw kɨles agek ma nɨg dɨlak okok, pɨlɨk amɨl kɨm amnɨgel tek ma lak. Ak nɨm mɨñɨl man ne alaŋ mɨdɨl takaw kɨles agek kud ñɨl kelɨgonɨgabun, chɨnop tɨtay gɨnɨgab? Pɨlɨk amnɨgun tek ma yɨbɨl lɨnɨgab.
